value:
This garb is different from the Mage
General uniform I usually wear...
How exciting!

The fact that a woman became Mage
General of Etruria upset many within
and without the country.$k$pI was rather despised at the time...

I will not hold back when training with
Roy or Lilina. That is a teacher's
duty, even if I only taught for a spell.

So we congratulate the bride and are
thus blessed with well wishes. We
then find new love, and nurture it...$k$pThere is so much for me to learn!

I can't seem to stop conducting
myself as a general... Is that all right?

I look forward to building a long-
lasting relationship with both you
and $Nf.

Today is a good day to spar with me.
After all, you can blame any mistakes
on being captivated by my dress!

Not only do I feel great in this outfit,
but my magic flows well too. Maybe
I should change up my usual attire...

You pick me? Really? Well, it's just,
I'm so...
I am filled with gratitude. Truly.

It may be "only" a festival, but it is still
worth celebrating properly. And since
I have fully prepared, let us do so.

I am an Etrurian general. And as the
honored Mage General, my duty is to
command troops and deliver justice.$k$pTherefore, my future husband must
also be wise and capable of leading
others.$k$p*sigh* I'm sure this isn't meant to be
a formal affair, and yet, here I am,
acting as though it were serious.$k$pBut...I can't go back to being "just"
Cecilia. Not that I had any intention
of going back, of course.$k$pI must rebuild and usher my country
into a new age. My future husband
has a tough job ahead of him.
Ha!
Here I go!
Kyah!
My dress...
I do!
Love eternal!
No obstacle too great!
Together!
Together...forever...
Ah...
How curious. Simply wearing a wedding dress makes me as nervous as a bride...
It's impolite to play tricks on a bride. You ought to know better!
I suppose even a Mage General can blush like a bride!
What's my type? Well, someone I can respect, I suppose.
That plan, in this dress? Surely I taught you better tactics than that.
Someday, perhaps, I will wear this dress for my own wedding.
I am grateful I could take part in this festival. Let's be off so we can enjoy it!
Wedding march!
Where to?
Lead on.
